G5070-d-08-18-01-WC.Accident Cause: Failure to comply with restricted speed in connection with the restrictive indication of a block or
G5070-d-08-18-01-WC.Narrative: YARD JOB-2200 TRAMP, CONSISTING OF 1 LOCOMOTIVE, 16 LOADS AND 13 EMPTIES WAS TRAVELING NORTH ON YARDON YARD TRACK 101 AT APROX. 3 MPH.  AS THE SAME TIME, TRAIN T349-17, CONSISTING OF 2 LOCOMOTIVES, 21 LOADS AND 75 EMPTIES WAS DEPARTING THE STEVENS POINT YARD ON TRACK 521 APPROX. 10 MPH.  THE ENGINEER ON THE 2200 TRAMP WAS PULLING THE DRAG OF 29 CARS OUT OF THE B-YARD WHEN HE WAS INSTRUCTED TO STOP.  HE WAS UNABLE TO STOP HIS TRAIN BEFORE FOULING THE CROSSOVERS AND HIT THE SIDE OF T349-14.  THEIMPACT CAUSED THE LOOMOTIVE AND 2 LEAD CARS ON THE 2200 TRAMP TO DERAIL.  THERE WERE 2 CARS ON TRAINT349-17 THAT DERAILED AND ANOTHER ONE SUSTAINED DAMAGE.  NO INJURIES WER REPORTED AND TESTING WAS DONE ON THE CREW OF THE 2200 TRAMP-ALL RESULTS WERE NEGATIVE.  INVESTIGATION INTO THE INCIDENT FOUNDTHAT THE ENGINEER FAILED TO COMPLY WITH THE RESTRICTED SPEED RULES IN THE YARD THUS ALLOWING HIS TRAIN TO RUN INTO THE SIDE TRAIN T349-17.NoneNoneNoneNoneNone

THE 15 LOCOMOTIVES THAT WERE LEFT IN TRACK FOUR ROLLED WESTWARD AND THE LEAD LOCOMOTIVE DERAILED AFTER ROLLING OVERTHE DERAIL.
